Therefore, we have established these terms and conditions to ensure full compliance when dealing with the platform. Please note that violating any of these terms may result in suspension or permanent banning of the violating user account without prior notice.

TermsPage.section2_item1: Platform: Refers to the Awraq platform providing accounting and analytical services.
TermsPage.section2_item2: User: The trader or shop owner benefiting from the platform's services.
TermsPage.section2_item3: Systems: The accounting and analytical services available to traders via the platform.
TermsPage.section3_item1: The user must be legally eligible to create an account on the platform.
TermsPage.section3_item2: The user is committed to providing accurate and correct data to the platform.
TermsPage.section3_item3: The user must be at least 18 years old.
TermsPage.section3_item4: The user is responsible for maintaining the security of their account information.
TermsPage.section4_item1: The user must use the platform in a way that does not cause harm to the platform or others.
TermsPage.section4_item2: The platform must not be used for any illegal or unethical purpose.
TermsPage.section4_item3: The user bears full responsibility for any damages resulting from misuse of the platform.
TermsPage.section5_content: The platform is responsible for providing accounting and analytical services to traders, but it is not liable for any errors or damages caused by misuse of the provided systems.
TermsPage.section6_content: The platform reserves the right to modify this policy at any time, and users will be notified of any significant changes.
TermsPage.section7_content: We are happy to respond to your inquiries through the platform's support team. We work to ensure an optimal experience for all users.

PrivacyPage.privacy_intro: At Awraq, we are committed to protecting the privacy of our users and ensuring the confidentiality of their personal data while using the platform and its services. We adhere to the highest standards of cybersecurity to ensure the safety of user data and compliance with applicable laws. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and share users' personal data.
PrivacyPage.privacy_section1_content: When using the Awraq platform, we collect the data that the user voluntarily provides during registration or while using the platform, including but not limited to:
PrivacyPage.privacy_section1_item2: Contact information such as email address and phone number.
PrivacyPage.privacy_section1_item3: Payment details such as credit card numbers or bank account information.
PrivacyPage.privacy_section1_item4: Business data such as business name and location.
PrivacyPage.privacy_section1_item5: Technical data such as IP address, device type, and activity logs within the platform.
PrivacyPage.privacy_section2_content: The data we collect is used to effectively provide our services and improve the user experience. These purposes include:
PrivacyPage.privacy_section2_item1: Creating and managing the user's account on the platform.
PrivacyPage.privacy_section2_item2: Providing accounting services and efficiently managing sales and purchases.
PrivacyPage.privacy_section2_item4: Sending important notifications and alerts related to services or updates.
PrivacyPage.privacy_section2_item5: Analyzing data to enhance platform performance and develop new services.
PrivacyPage.privacy_section3_content: We do not share personal data with any third party without user consent, except in the following cases:
PrivacyPage.privacy_section3_item1: When required by law or at the request of competent authorities.
PrivacyPage.privacy_section3_item2: With our service partners, such as payment gateways or technical support services, provided they maintain data confidentiality.
PrivacyPage.privacy_section3_item3: For security purposes, such as fraud prevention or investigation of illegal platform use.
PrivacyPage.privacy_section4_content: We use the latest technologies and security measures to protect user data from unauthorized access, loss, or modification. However, we note that no electronic transmission or storage method can guarantee absolute security.
PrivacyPage.privacy_section5_content: The Awraq platform uses cookies to improve user experience and customize content and services. Users can control cookie settings through their browser, but this may affect platform functionality.
PrivacyPage.privacy_section6_content: Users have the following rights regarding their personal data:
PrivacyPage.privacy_section6_item1: The right to access personal data we hold.
PrivacyPage.privacy_section6_item2: The right to correct or update inaccurate data.
PrivacyPage.privacy_section6_item3: The right to request data deletion when it is no longer needed.
PrivacyPage.privacy_section6_item4: The right to object to data usage for marketing purposes.
PrivacyPage.privacy_section7_content: We may make changes to this Privacy Policy from time to time to meet operational or legal requirements. Users will be notified of any significant changes via email or through a notification on the platform.
PrivacyPage.privacy_section8_content: If you have any inquiries or complaints regarding the Privacy Policy, you can contact our support team through the available channels on the platform.
PrivacyPage.privacy_section9_content: This Privacy Policy is governed by the laws of Saudi Arabia. In case of disputes, they will be resolved by the competent authorities.
